Treatments

* All treatments are currently at a reduced rate and will be until my graduate clinic ends in Nov 2020. I currently charge £25 per hour for a treatment.

For private mobile appointments I charge an additonal 45p per mile within the Maidstone Area.

For more information about any of the treatments please feel free to get in touch.

Body

We are all unique and our bodies are the same so its important to create a treatment bespoke to you after a consultation I will develop a treatment that’s is unique to you, using carefully chosen organic and natural products.

Full Body Massage

This treatment will focus on relieving tension and stress I will use Swedish massage and deep tissue techniques to relieve muscular tension. Focusing on shoulders neck and back.

60mins / 90mins

Shoulders, Neck & Back

This treatment will focus on relieving tension and stress I will use Swedish massage and deep tissue techniques to relieve muscular tension. Focusing on shoulders neck and back

45mins / 60-mins

Face

A holistic facial is not only about making your skin feel beautiful, it’s about creating confidence from the inside after a consultation we will select organic and natural products to help your skin feel radiant and for you to feel relaxed.

Holistic Facial

Using natural, organic products I will create a facial personal to you To help balance, stimulate and nourish the skin. I will cleanse, exfoliate, use a face mask and moisturise I will also massage arms hands and décolletage to help relief tension and stress while making you feel more confident.

60mins / 90mins
